actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To repeal the provisions in the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 relating to the inclusion of Social Security and certain railroad retirement benefits in gross income to the extent such provisions do not apply to nonresident aliens.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Repeals, except with respect to nonresident aliens, Internal Revenue Code provisions that include social security and tier I railroad retirement benefits in the gross (taxable) income of certain taxpayers.

titles.title: To repeal the provisions in the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 relating to the inclusion of Social Security and certain railroad retirement benefits in gross income to the extent such provisions do not apply to nonresident aliens.
